personal.name: Dicle Ceylan
personal.title: Software Engineering Intern Candidate • Software Developer • Privacy & AI Researcher
personal.summary: Software Engineering Intern with experience in developing scalable software solutions and automation tools. Proficient in Python, C++, SQL, and REST API design. Skilled in cloud platforms, automation, cyber security fundamentals, and privacy engineering (PLDP).

Point-of-sale operations and customer service.
